main event: A driver observed a bright, fluorescent-shaped object in the sky at approximately 10:30 p.m. in Newington, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object was approximately 500 feet in the air and 1/2 mile away., It had a football-like shape and appeared to be hovering and rotating., The object emitted a silvery color and a fluorescent glow., The driver pulled over to observe the phenomenon for about 2 minutes., The object took off at a high speed to the southwest and disappeared from sight.
